Title: Prohibits any person from transporting or selling a nonambulatory animal unless such animal is humanely euthanized
Summary: Prohibits any person from transporting, holding, buying, selling, giving, receiving or marketing a nonambulatory animal unless such animal is first humanely euthanized without undue delay from the time that such animal becomes nonambulatory; makes certain exceptions; provides violation provisions; defines relevant terms.
LawCode: Add ยง357-a, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to nonambulatory animals
